baseParameters.Query:
SELECT Config_Value FROM Master_Config
WHERE Config_Key ={} AND Config_IsActive = {}
SELECT Config_Value FROM Master_Config WHERE Config_Key ={} AND Config_IsActive = {}

baseParameters.query:
SELECT  
	CAST(ClaimMessage_MessageID AS VARCHAR(255)) AS ClaimMessage_MessageID,
	ClaimMessage_MessageType,
	ClaimMessage_CCMVersion,
	ClaimMessage_CCMSchemaName,
	ClaimMessage_OriginatingSystemCode,
	Claim_ClaimFolderNumber,
	Claim_PolicyNumber,
	Claim_PrimaryClaimExaminerCode,
	CAST(DATE_FORMAT(Claim_AssignmentDate,'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss\'Z\'') AS VARCHAR(255)) AS Claim_AssignmentDate,
	Claim_ExaminerGroupCode,
	/* CAST(CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),RecCrtTs) AS VARCHAR(30)) AS RecordCreateTime */
	CAST(DATE_FORMAT(RecCrtTs, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS VARCHAR(30)) AS RecordCreateTime
FROM STG_EXT_PrimaryExaminer
WHERE 
Sent_To_CSV =0 and Is_current='Y'

baseParameters.Query:
SELECT Ext_FileSuffix FROM LOG_Batch_Identifier
WHERE Batch_ID = '{}'
SELECT Config_Value FROM Master_Config WHERE Config_Key ={} AND Config_IsActive = {}

baseParameters.query:
SELECT
CAST(ClaimMessage_MessageID AS VARCHAR(255)) AS ClaimMessage_MessageID,
ClaimMessage_MessageType,
ClaimMessage_CCMVersion,
ClaimMessage_CCMSchemaName,
ClaimMessage_OriginatingSystemCode,
Claim_ReserveTransactionNumber,
Claim_ReserveTransactionOriginatingSystemCode,
Claim_ClaimFeatureNumber,
Claim_PolicyNumber,
CAST(Claim_ReserveTransactionSequenceNumber AS VARCHAR(255)) AS Claim_ReserveTransactionSequenceNumber,
/* CAST(FORMAT(Reserve_EntryDate,'yyyy-MM-ddTHH:mm:ssZ') AS VARCHAR(255)) AS Reserve_EntryDate,
CAST(CONVERT(DATE,Reserve_EffectiveDate) AS VARCHAR(255)) AS Reserve_EffectiveDate, */
CAST(DATE_FORMAT(Reserve_EntryDate,'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss\'Z\'') AS VARCHAR(255)) AS Reserve_EntryDate,
CAST(DATE_FORMAT(Reserve_EffectiveDate, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS VARCHAR(255)) AS Reserve_EffectiveDate,
Details_CostTypeCode,
Details_CostCategoryCode,
Details_RecoveryTypeCode,
CAST(Details_ReserveAmount AS VARCHAR(255)) AS Details_ReserveAmount ,
Details_CurrencyCode,
/* CAST(CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),RecCrtTs) AS VARCHAR(30)) AS RecordCreateTime, */
CAST(DATE_FORMAT(RecCrtTs, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS VARCHAR(30)) AS RecordCreateTime,
Claim_ClaimFolderNumber
FROM STG_EXT_Reserve
WHERE 
Sent_To_CSV =0 and Is_current='Y'

baseParameters.query:
SELECT  
	CAST(ClaimMessage_Message_ID AS VARCHAR(255)) AS ClaimMessage_MessageID,
	ClaimMessage_MessageType,
	ClaimMessage_CCMVersion,
	ClaimMessage_CCMSchemaName,
	ClaimMessage_OriginatingSystemCode,
	Claim_ClaimFolderNumber,
	Claim_PolicyNumber,
	Claim_SecondaryClaimExaminerCode,
	CAST(DATE_FORMAT(Claim_AssignmentDate,'yyyy-MM-dd\'T\'HH:mm:ss\'Z\'') AS VARCHAR(255)) AS Claim_AssignmentDate,
	Claim_ExaminerGroupCode,
	/* CAST(CONVERT(DATETIME2(0),RecCrtTs) AS VARCHAR(30)) AS RecordCreateTime */
	CAST(DATE_FORMAT(RecCrtTs, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss') AS VARCHAR(30)) AS RecordCreateTime
FROM STG_EXT_SecondaryExaminer
WHERE 
Sent_To_CSV =0 and Is_current='Y'
